sentences: Elena Petrová, née Krupková (9 November 1929 – 10 April 2002) was a Czech composer.
She was born in Modrý Kameň, and studied piano with Karel Hoffmeister and composition with Jan Kapr and Miloslav Istvan at the Janáček Academy of Music.

Vzývání (Invocation), Song Cycle for male chamber chorus (1977); words by the composer

Sluneční sonáta (Sunny Sonata) for soprano and piano (1992)
